report.name: bjhano

dataSource.name: Q_anomalies
dataSource.select: select -- donnees au niveau ressource/mois bjh_ressource.matricule , bjh_ressource.mois , bjh_ressource.ident , bjh_ressource.nom , bjh_ressource.prenom , bjh_ressource.dep || '/' || bjh_ressource.pole deppole , bjh_ressource.codsg , bjh_ressource.conso_total , bjh_ressource.conso_conge , bjh_ressource.conso_autre , NVL(bjh_ressource.conso_total,0) - NVL(bjh_ressource.conso_conge,0) - NVL(bjh_ressource.conso_autre,0) conso_projet , bjh_ressource.tempart , bjh_ressource.conso_total-calendrier.cjours ecartcal -- donnees au niveau anomalies , bjh_anomalies.typeabsence , bjh_anomalies.coutbip , bjh_anomalies.coutgip , NVL(bjh_anomalies.coutbip, 0) - NVL(bjh_anomalies.coutgip, 0) difference , NVL(bjh_extgip.motifabs, ' ') motifabs , NVL(bjh_extgip.intjour, 0) intjour , DECODE(bjh_anomalies.topdv, NULL, '', 'Anomalie dévalidée') devalide FROM bjh_ressource, calendrier, datdebex, bjh_anomalies, bjh_extgip WHERE ADD_MONTHS(datdebex.datdebex, bjh_ressource.mois-1)=calendrier.calanmois AND bjh_ressource.matricule=bjh_anomalies.matricule(+) AND bjh_ressource.mois=bjh_anomalies.mois(+) AND bjh_anomalies.matricule=bjh_extgip.matricule(+) AND bjh_anomalies.mois=bjh_extgip.mois(+) AND bjh_anomalies.typeabsence=bjh_extgip.bipabs(+) AND (bjh_ressource.conso_total!=calendrier.cjours or bjh_anomalies.matricule is not null) -- habilitations AND bjh_ressource.codsg IN (SELECT codsg FROM vue_dpg_perime WHERE INSTR(pack_global.lire_perime(:p_global), codbddpg) > 0 ) -- seulement les anomalies pas validees AND bjh_anomalies.validation1 IS NULL AND bjh_anomalies.validation2 IS NULL &P_WHERE ORDER BY bjh_ressource.codsg , bjh_ressource.matricule , bjh_ressource.mois /

dataDescriptor.expression: NVL ( bjh_ressource.conso_total , 0 ) - NVL ( bjh_ressource.conso_conge , 0 ) - NVL ( bjh_ressource.conso_autre , 0 )

textSegment.string: Le - signifie qu'il y a moins de jours homme saisis dans la BIP

function.name: cf_1formula
afterpform
